about_the_game:
“The Real Faces of VTuber” is a detective-genre visual novel experience. Players can play as a prosecutor to investigate a murder case.

Narrative Background

A horrendous murder took place in the firm to which the popular VTuber Kurapa belongs. The owner of the agency is killed in the office. The suspects are 6 employees who hold keys to the office. Peculiarly, three of the staff allege to be the Nakanohito(Japanese term, referring to the real face of a VTuber) of Kurapa, claiming that they were streaming at the time of the incident as alibi. You will play as the prosecutor tasked with the investigation and unraveling the truth behind the case.

Game Features

【Investigation Stage】
Players can summon suspects to district prosecutor’s office for interrogation. Discern contradictions in their testimonies and determine the course of the investigation. After collecting enough evidence, players can decide whom to charge with the murder.
【Courtroom Stage】
By asking right questions, guide prosecution witnesses to give testimony favorable to the prosecution. Present evidence, point out the flaws in defense witnesses’ testimonies to discredit them. Analyze the statements and successive arguments to secure the final win of the suit.

content_descriptors.notes: The game depicts a murder case and includes mild gore when the body appears.
